product_name: Marmot Speed Light Rain Jacket - Men's
long_description: Perfect for backpacking, The Marmot Speed Light jacket shelters you in a truly technical shell with the extraordinary weather protection of Gore-Tex(R) Pro Shell fabric in a lightweight design. Waterproof, breathable three-layer Gore-Tex Pro Shell fabric is micro-stitched and seam taped for maximum waterproof protection. Helmet-compatible hood with laminated wire brim provides excellent visibility. Harness- and pack-friendly pockets have water-resistant zippers and laser-drilled pocket backing for enhanced breathability. Asymmetric cuffs with rip-and-stick tab adjustments seal in warmth; make quick adjustments via the hem drawcord. Angel-wing Movement(TM) allows you to raise your arms without your jacket body also creeping up; elbows are articulated for a comfortable fit.
